Summary: about 12 45am 5 yellow orange objects travelled across sky from south to north
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Goshen
There were no other sightings in Goshen on or around April 1st 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsgot up to let cat in seen one glowing light in sky then noticed two more following behind it so woke up girlfriend to witness it then three more came behind them was a total of 5 objects and they didnt look like planes or copters no noise could be heard or blinking lights seen then they disappeared behind cloud cover were we the only ones to see this?wasnt able to get video or pictures but believe it was not any ordinary objects.
